about.title: About Us
about.p1: Crandon Lumber is a regional supplier and exporter of high-quality lumber and building materials, serving Central America with a strong focus on reliability, compliance, and long-term partnerships.
about.p2: Headquartered in Guatemala City, Crandon Lumber specializes in the distribution and export of Southern Yellow Pine (SYP) sourced directly from leading sawmills in the southeastern United States. Our operations support key markets including El Salvador, Mexico, and neighboring countries.
about.p3: El Salvador represents a strategic growth market for Crandon Lumber. Supported by a dollarized economy, pro-trade policies, and the CAFTA-DR free trade agreement, the country offers favorable conditions for the import of U.S.-origin lumber.
about.p4: Crandon Lumber operates in strict compliance with international trade, customs, and phytosanitary regulations. All shipments are accompanied by the required commercial documentation and USDA APHIS phytosanitary certifications.
about.p5: Our logistics strategy ensures efficiency, reliability, and timely delivery through experienced logistics partners and established regional transportation networks.
about.p6: By sourcing Southern Yellow Pine directly from top-producing U.S. sawmills, Crandon Lumber maintains control over product quality, pricing stability, and supply continuity.
about.p7: Crandon Lumber is committed to building long-term partnerships based on trust, quality, and operational excellence across Central America.
